alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHWESTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Sunbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Granville, Johnstown, Sunbury, Utica, Galena, Alexandria, Hartford, St. Louisville, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Olive Green and Center Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
